item.title: Marathoning Mirrors a Booming Sports & Fitness Industry
item.description: Marathoning hobbyist Du Liyuan nears the finish-lineCourtesy: Du Liyuan BEIJING – The official time read 1:43:45. Du Liyuan was excited, since he had just achieved his personal best – and done so in the 2017 Beijing Half Marathon. For the 27-year-old product manager, this was already his fourth marathon of the year. Yet when Du took up running only two years ago, it wasn’t with such competitive aspirations in mind.
